article_title: TSA Worker Killed in LAX Shooting; Suspect in Custody
article_text:
LOS ANGELES—A gunman opened fire Friday morning inside Los Angeles International Airport, killing a Transportation Security Administration officer and shooting his way past the screening area into a terminal packed with travelers.

The shooting shut down one of the world's busiest airports for hours and affected air traffic across the country as flights to and from the airport, known as LAX, were canceled, delayed or diverted. By...

twitter.description: A gunman opened fire at Los Angeles International Airport Friday morning, killing one TSA officer and wounding several others, and causing the shutdown of at least one terminal before being taken into custody.
twitter.title: TSA Worker Killed in LAX Shooting; Suspect in Custody

article_summary:
The shooting shut down one of the world's busiest airports for hours and affected air traffic across the country as flights to and from the airport, known as LAX, were canceled, delayed or diverted.
LOS ANGELES—A gunman opened fire Friday morning inside Los Angeles International Airport, killing a Transportation Security Administration officer and shooting his way past the screening area into a terminal packed with travelers.
